mapper.select: select u.id id, name, sno, account, ifnull(sum(duringScore), 0) + ifnull(sum(afterScore), 0) score from student u left join score s on u.id = s.uid where name like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%') or u.id like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%') or sno like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%') or account like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%') group by u.id order by u.id asc
select c.id cid, duringScore, afterScore, aNum from contests c left join (select * from student u join score s on u.id = s.uid where u.id = #{id}) temp on c.id = temp.cid
